mainContent:
## About me  
I like making things that are useful to people.  
I like systemic solutions to systemic problems.  
I like the ethics and principles of permaculture.  
I like using game theory on real life.  
I like making the most out of the least.  
  
I am looking for an internship for the 2021 summer! If you want to work with me, I would love to hear from you.  
  
Letâ€™s get in touch! Get me at [Rose@RoseKir.by](mailto:Rose@RoseKir.by?subject=Hey%20Rose!)
